title: Looking For An OJ Alex McKinnon
author: z28jd

posts.post_title: Looking For An OJ Alex McKinnon
posts.post_content:
I need to get the Alex McKinnon, stooping for ball pose. Trying to get all four of his poses and that's the last one I need. If you have one, help me finish the set, any condition is fine. I have some OJs to trade, or if it's low grade, I'll buy it. Thanks in advance

Included a scan from the Met collection, just so there isn't any confusion as to what I'm looking for...
Got it already! Thanks to all that looked
